languages.text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: До своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} по этому существу снижен, а также оно получает временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming damage is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary wounds.

Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

この生物の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、その生物にふりかかる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は軽減される。さらに、この生物は一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、この生物にふりかかるダメージは軽減される。さらに、この生物は一時的な傷を得る。

languages.text: 此生物承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。此外，此生物获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物承受的伤害降低，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。此外，此生物获得临时生命值。

languages.text: Hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que recibe se reduce. Además, la criatura gana {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
languages.original_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, el daño que recibe se reduce. Además, la criatura gana heridas temporales.

languages.text: Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} dieser Kreatur wird ihr erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} reduziert. Außerdem erhält diese Kreatur temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} dieser Kreatur wird ihr eingehender Schaden reduziert. Außerdem erhält diese Kreatur temporäre Wunden.

languages.text: Une réduction s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis par cette créature jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. De plus, elle bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
languages.original_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une réduction s'applique aux dégâts subis par cette créature jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celle-ci. De plus, elle bénéficie de blessures temporaires.

languages.translation_comment:
III глава. Локация CommorraghArena.
Абилка особого гротеска из 3-й фазы финального боя. Дублирует Endure из класса Fighter.

languages.text: Yaratığın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek, aldığı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} miktarı azalır. Yaratık ayrıca geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: Until this creature's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, its incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced. Also, this creature gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
